Package iot.lora

Interface FrameHeader

All Known Implementing Classes:
BasicFrameHeader
public interface FrameHeader
Interface that represent the frame header at MAC level

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    byte[] getFCnt()  
    short getFCntAsShort()  
    byte getFCtrl()  
    byte[] getFOpts()  
    byte[] getSourceAddress()  
    default java.lang.String getSourceAddressAsString()  
    default boolean hasOptions()  

  • Method Details

    • getSourceAddress

      byte[] getSourceAddress()
      Returns:
      the address of the sender as byte array of size 4

    • getSourceAddressAsString

      default java.lang.String getSourceAddressAsString()

    • getFCtrl

      byte getFCtrl()

    • getFCnt

      byte[] getFCnt()
      Returns:
      frame counter as byte array of size 2

    • getFCntAsShort

      short getFCntAsShort()
      Returns:
      frame counter as short

    • getFOpts

      byte[] getFOpts()
      Returns:
      byte array with frame options. It could be empty

    • hasOptions

      default boolean hasOptions()
      Returns:
      true if the header contains at least one option, false otherwise
